Name: TANKBOX
About the game: TANKBOX is a simple action arcade game in which you control your own little toy tank to battle it out against other AI controlled tanks, all residing in a simple wooden box. Be warned, TANKBOX might take more strategy than you think! Local/Online 2 Player Co-operative Multiplayer. Local co-op requires a controller. 12 different colored AI tanks that have their own unique abilities and personalities. 200 Levels split over 2 campaigns (100 each). An assortment of hats with some spicing up gameplay. Included Campaign Editor (up to 100 levels) with workshop support.
Meta Title: TANKBOX: Jun 24, 2021, Isaac Andrews and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on TANKBOX? Check out the release date (Jun 24, 2021), developer insights from Isaac Andrews, and a complete game summary.
